import './intro.scss' import {useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import { Card, CardBody} from 'reactstrap'; import { init } from 'ityped' export default function Intro() { const textRef = useRef(); useEffect(()=>{ init(textRef.current,{ showCursor:true, backDelay:1500, backSpeed:60, strings:["Developer", "Designer", "Content Creater"], }); },[]) return (

You better cut the pizza in four pieces because I'm not hungry enough to eat six.

Yogi Berra, The Wit and Wisdom of Yogi Berra, P. Pepe, Diversion Books, 2014

Hi there, I'am

Ray Peng

Freelance

) }
